resources.string: Securely share your location in realtime.
We need GPS satellites enabled in Settings > Location Access.

To reduce battery drain, adjust the time interval between location updates when you are at home or at the office or whenever your mobile device is connected to WIFI. Minimum of 300 seconds (5 minutes).
Adjust Map zoom when vehicle is moving in high speeds.
Please specify a valid username with a minimum of 6 characters.
Please specify a valid password with at least 8 characters.
Please specify a valid 4 digit pin
Passwords did not match and it should be at least 8 characters.
